question.text:
Match the column:
 
  Column I   Column II
1 Copper A Needed for the synthesis of Auxin
2 Boron B Pollen germination
3 Zinc C Associated with an enzyme involved in Redox reaction

options.text: <math><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math>

<math><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>

<math><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>

<math><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math>

solution.text: Zinc is a microelement required to plants for the synthesis of Indole acetic acid (IAA) a universal natural auxin, proteins, and RNA. Copper is also a microelement involved in the electron transport, chlorophyll synthesis and maintenance of carbohydrate/nitrogen balance. Boron, a microelement is required for the formation of pollen tube, root nodule formation, cell elongation and differentiation.
